Question: The President spoke for about a minute, after which this person responded for about thirty seconds.
Hints: In a 2010 Space Foundation survey, this person was ranked as the #1 most popular space hero.
This person and Butchart brought the aircraft into a nose-down alignment to increase speed, then launched the Skyrocket.
This person later completed his master of science degree in aeronautical engineering at the University of Southern California.
